Entries.NPC.cs.4001: ผลไม้นั่น ติดมากับรายการสั่งซื้อ เครื่องสำอางล่าสุดของฉัน ถือเป็นของตอบแทนความภักดี น่ะ... ของที่ให้มา น่าจะขายความเยาว์วัย กับความมีชีวิตชีวา#$b#ฉันให้เธอเพราะ... ก็เพราะคิดว่า เธอก็คงจะให้เหมือนกัน$l#$b#รู้นะว่า ฉันเคยค่อนข้าง เอาตัวเองเป็นจุดศูนย์กลาง กับชอบตัดสินคนอื่น... ตอนเจอเธอครั้งแรก ฉันทำตัวแย่มาก$s#$b#แต่พอได้รู้จักมักคุ้น ฉันก็เห็นเธอแวะคุย กับคนที่ฉันไม่เคยสนใจ... จำวันเกิด... ให้ของขวัญ เพื่อแค่ให้พวกเขา มีความสุขเลย... #$b#มันทำให้ฉันคิดว่า ฉันอยากปฏิบัติกับคนอื่นยังไง การเป็นคนดี กับคนที่ฉันสนิทด้วย เป็นแค่จุดเริ่มต้นนะ... ในชีวิตประจำวัน ฉันจะหาวิธี ฝึกเป็นคนจิตใจกว้าง ให้เยอะขึ้น#$b#แต่ตอนนี้... ฉันรักเธอ @ หวังว่าจะชอบของขวัญนะ$l

Entries.decorate: faceDirection Haley 1/speak Haley "...Decorate?$h#$b#*giggle* Normally I'd be all for that, but you can't see much in here... Entries.Tue10: Oof. I stayed up late reading cookbooks and trying out a couple of new recipes.$s#$e#Why? ...It's embarrassing, but I guess I want you to see me as a responsible adult? Part of that is learning to cook for myself.$s#$e#I'll share some with you sometime!
Entries.Sun10_inlaw_Emily: The house is so empty and quiet without Emily around. I get so lonely.$s#$e#Why don't you two come by sometime? We can have a little dinner party.
Entries.summer_Wed10: Oh, I was just about to reapply my sunscreen. Can you help?$h#$e#I just need some right between my shoulder blades. Thanks so much!
Entries.summer_Sat10: Well, I thought this day couldn't get any nicer!$h#$e#It's good to see you.
Entries.summer_Sun10_inlaw_Emily: The house is so empty and quiet without Emily around. I get so lonely.$s#$e#Why don't you two come by sometime? We can have a little dinner party.
Entries.fall_Fri10: Hey, bestie. I was just thinking about you.#$e#I'm glad you came by.
Entries.fall_Sun10_inlaw_Emily: The house is so empty and quiet without Emily around. I get so lonely.$s#$e#Why don't you two come by sometime? We can have a little dinner party.
Entries.winter_Tue10: Alex and I have had kind of an on-again off-again thing since we were kids.$u#$e#He's a good guy. I'd like it to work out, but there might be too much history and hurt feelings there.$s#$e#Thanks for letting me talk through this stuff with you.
Entries.winter_Fri10: I never thought I'd say this, but I actually think it's really cool that you live on a farm. I wish I did, too.#$e#I just keep thinking about how it'll look when all of the plants bloom again in the spring.#$e#I like thinking of you out in the field, too. I'm happy you found work that fulfills you.

Entries.fall_Sun10: I don't think I'd be very happy in this town without you, @. So, thank you.#$e#Seriously, I'll do anything for you if you need it.$8
Entries.Thu10: I was thinking I could try to move away someday, whenever it became clear that Alex's career wouldn't ever get off the ground.$s#$b#But now, I don't think I would move away, even if I could. I have too much to lose here.

Entries.Rainy_Day_3: #$c .5#You want me to go out there with you and ruin my hair? Heehee, no, I'll pass.$h#I can't go outside today... it'll mess up my hair. Sorry, @...$s#$e#Maybe some people would think it's silly, but these things are important to me.$7
Entries.Rainy_Day_4: #$c .5#Oh no... If this weather keeps up I'll get so pale.$s#Are you going out in this weather? Just make sure to wipe your boots on the way back in, {{Lowercase:{{TermofEndearment}}}}.#$e#I'll just stay here and do some housework.
Entries.Rainy_Night_4: #$c .5#Cooking helped pass the time today. It just took a little effort to get started. [727 231 207 199]#I made a hot meal for you, {{Lowercase:{{TermofEndearment}}}}. Lots of spice, just how you like it. Enjoy! [727 231 207 199]$h
Entries.Indoor_Day_1: Good morning, {{Lowercase:{{TermofEndearment}}}}! Smells good, doesn't it? I made you breakfast! [194 195 210 211 216]#$e#$c .5#Cooking's a lot more fun when you've got someone to cook for.$11#I know you're busy with your work. I'm here to support you in any way I can!
Entries.Indoor_Day_2: #$c .5#Morning, sunshine! You still look a little sleepy.$h#Did you sleep okay? I thought I could hear you snoring.$h#$e#I've got some chores to do in here. Have a good day.
Entries.Indoor_Day_3: #$c .5#I'm glad I've learned to enjoy cleaning! The house gets dirty very easily. It's satisfying to get everything squeaky clean.#I hope today's not too busy of a day. We should spend some time with each other.#$e#Can I have a hug before you leave?
Entries.Indoor_Day_4: #$c .5#I felt like I had no direction in life before I met you. Now I have exactly what I want.#Good morning, {{Lowercase:{{TermofEndearment}}}}. Another day of farm chores, huh? I'll be thinking of you. <$h
Entries.Indoor_Night_1: #$c .5#Thanks for letting me handle the domestic side of things. I really like supporting you in that way.#Good evening, {{Lowercase:{{TermofEndearment}}}}. Anything I can get you to help you unwind?
Entries.Indoor_Night_2: Oh good, you're back!$h#$e#$c .5#This is probably my favorite time of the day.$h#How was your day?
Entries.Indoor_Night_3: #$c .5#Oh, that smell? I'm trying out this new fleur de cerisier perfume. What do you think, does it suit me?#Good evening, {{Lowercase:{{TermofEndearment}}}}. Ready to wind down?
Entries.Outdoor_1: #$c .5#I'm going to give Emily a call today. I just need to wait until she gets up.#We've got to make sure the farm is cute! That might be important... right, @?
Entries.Outdoor_2: #$c .5#Is today going to be another busy day?#Hi, {{Lowercase:{{TermofEndearment}}}}! If I knew more about farm work I'd help you out more. Sorry!#$e#I'll be thinking of you.$h
Entries.Outdoor_4: #$c .5#Looks like a good day for me to get some sun, don't you think?$h#Don't overwork yourself, {{Lowercase:{{TermofEndearment}}}}. Make sure and take a break every now and then, or get something to eat.
Entries.funReturn_Haley: #$c .5#Everyone's so much nicer to me these days. It's probably because I'm nicer to them, too.$h#It was nice seeing everyone in town. Did you have a good day, {{Lowercase:{{TermofEndearment}}}}?
Entries.spring_14: I hope you don't mind if I catch up with Alex during the festivals. I don't mean to ditch you... I want to celebrate with you, too.$7#$e#You'll always be my first priority, but my relationship with Alex is also important to me.
Entries.spring_23: What? Of course we're still young enough for the flower dance. Don't be silly.$h#$e#And I'm looking forward to showing the whole town how proud I am to be {{RelationshipLabel}} with you.
Entries.summer_27: The moonlight jellies are tomorrow night. You're coming to see them with me, right?

Entries.Indoor_Night_Haley: You look like you've been working hard. Want to chat about something light to de-stress?#$e#I can tell you all about the new blouse Emily made for me!
Entries.Indoor_Night_0: #$c .5#You look like you've been working hard. Want to just relax and watch TV with me for a bit?#I never thought I'd say this, but the country lifestyle really suits me.$h
Entries.Rainy_Night_0: #$c .5#Oh, I'm glad you're back. I was bored in here by myself... Are you ready to wind down for the night?#*giggle* When you get soaked in the rain, it's gross, but it also makes you look tough.$h
Entries.summer_22: Emily made me a new summer outfit. It's just my style, too! That was really thoughtful of her.
Entries.TwoKids_3: #$c .5#A big house, two kids, a beautiful plot of land, and my BFF by my side... I'm not sure what else I could ask for.#One more positive thing about adopting? I got to keep my figure.$h

Entries.Indoor_Night_0: #$c .5#You look like you've been working hard. Let me help you de-stress.$l#I never thought I'd say this, but the country lifestyle really suits me.$h

Entries.winter_16: It looks chilly tonight...$s#$e#I-I think I'm heading down to the Night Market tonight. If I procrastinate any longer it's only gonna get colder.

Entries.marriage_r3: Hi, @. You look really stylish today.
Entries.marriage_r4: Is it weird for me to say that I'm missing the farm right now?#$b#Love you, bestie!$h
Entries.marriage_marriageroom: Hi, {{Lowercase:{{TermofEndearment}}}}. I'm just processing some film in the darkroom. I'll be home soon.
Entries.marriage_doctorafter: Well that wasn't as bad as I thought it would be.#$b#It's my turn to comfort you at your next check up. You can count on me!$h#$b#Say, when *is* your next check up?
Entries.marriage_photobus: The angle of the town is perfect from here! Why did no one tell me?#$b#Now I wish you'd have asked me to move in sooner!$h
Entries.marriage_photobus2: Be honest, do I look like a creep standing here and taking pictures?$s#$b#Aw, you're just buttering me up.$h
Entries.marriage_photobeach: The ocean is only the second most beautiful thing in this town... at least when I get my makeup just right. *giggle*$h
Entries.marriage_nmpre: Hey, {{Lowercase:{{TermofEndearment}}}}! Don't mind me, I'm just gonna stay here and warm up until the Night Market is open!$h#$b#It turns out Emily already went, so it's just us two tonight.
